website_summaries.verdict: The ideal anti-theft bag to purchase if you are looking for supreme comfort and portability.
pros: Intentionally made lightweight for easy carry
Comes with a combination lock to keep unwanted individuals from opening the pack
S-curved shoulder straps provide comfort to upper body
Has external connection for USB and headphones
cons: Not waterproof as advertised, but water resistant
A few customers had issues with the seams coming loose

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack and Very Responsive Merchant!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack in preparation for my 19 day trip in the Philippines. It is exactly what I Wanted and needed for my trip. The build quality is great and the added usb worked well for my power bank. The only concern I had was the secure locking mechanism for the largest compartment since it broke on the second day of the trip. Not a deal breaker since the backpack was still quite functional. But to my surprise , CPSZ responded to my feedback and replaced my backpack immediately, free of charge! I am still on my trip but I received confirmation my backpack has already been delivered! Thank you CPSZ!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bag from them. I like the design, the bag has enough space for 2 laptops and a tablet and maybe a notebook. N sure I would say it is big enough to replace luggage. I often used my northface jesture bag for a carry on. This one is more subtle and the spaces and pockets for flash drives and harddrives and charges are clutch. Speaking of chargers, it would benefit to get one the size of maybe a laptop harddrive at biggest. The space for it is not that large but i did recommend this bag to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Used this bag over the weekend for a short competition trip and loved it. I put a power bank in the bag, connected to the USB cable inside, and charged my phone from the outlet on the bag. It is so convenient and reduced clutter. The bag has good capacity to hold computer, iPad, our snacks, and water bottle on the side holder. Many pockets inside also make it easier to separate various items.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It was perfect for traveling for work purposes. I love the different compartments, and the space. I can charge my phone and plug my headphones in with opening my whole bag. It looks stylish and very comfortable. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: precious

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter that is in 7th grade about 7 months ago and now it is ripping at the seam.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like ordered 1 st one tested lock, wouldn’t open.thankfully I tested before I put anything in. Got a second and same thing happened. Sent both bsck and got my $$ back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: speedracer

customer_reviews.title: Read review. Good product just needs to come with directions?!
customer_reviews.text: Used it while flying on air plane. However it charged but never could get it to work. Never came with instructions. The lock worked perfect and the bag was a perfect size Inside for travel. Several pockets inside and out. Used the outside pockets for water bottles too. The straps on shoulders felt great. However the bag is great just could get earphones or charger to work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie mills

customer_reviews.title: Lock dosent work
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it everything was great!!! Set the lock numbers then tried it out it worked so I put it away for my trip just got it out locks wont work and yes my numbers are correct
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jensen

customer_reviews.title: This is a garbage bag with straps.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst backpack I have ever owned. First off the lock resets itself so the first one I owned locked itself and I had to break the zipper to get my laptop out. The second one did the same thing but I didn’t use the lock. The zippers still broke and came undone. It just sucks. Take your business elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hunger

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Made a great backpack for everyday use for about a year until the zippers started breaking. Not a terrible backpack for the price.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after a month of use by a high schooler. Fit a decent amount of stuff but not useful if it just falls apart!
customer_reviews.author: Computer Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, crappy zipper
customer_reviews.text: This was a great backpack that I used everyday to carry my laptop and a few other things for work. It also served well when traveling on short business trips. The only complaint that I have is that zipper and some of the snaps are of poor quality. I bought the bag in Jan 2018 and the zipper is already busted which leaves that bag useless. For the price it’s a good short term bag...don’t expect to get years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: T Mac

customer_reviews.title: Holds a LOT of stuff
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use while we were at Disney. It held everything that I needed and it was definitely a plus to have the charger ports to charge my phone on. The side pocket holds a large water bottle with no issue. I had a ton of stuff in the backpack and still had plenty of room. Now it is not the coolest backpack to wear. It holds heat and sweat on the straps and where it sits on our back. After a few hours, it does start to get uncomfortable but that also could be because I am not use to carrying a backpack all day and it did have quite a bit of stuff in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa KTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Very meh.
customer_reviews.text: Well it locks... that was cool. It didn’t fit our belongings well, including no real area for water bottles and the first one we got had some stitching mistakes that made the usb area unusable. Wouldn’t recommend with so many other charging backpacks for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & spacious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack before my study abroad and first semester of grad school because my other one was old and not padded or spacious. I took this backpack everywhere. Perfect for keeping my laptop safe and stuffing with clothes. I like the pockets inside the large part and the small front area. It’s still going strong and this was months ago and after being toted all across Europe and my campus back here in the states.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn l.

customer_reviews.title: Good Backpack in this price range
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new backpack as i was starting my new job. The laptop works fine if you do not have a lot of stuff to carry . I generally take my macbook and an ipad with me and the bag almost gets full. It is perfect for livht weight traveller but will not recommend to those who carry lots of stuff with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ibi

customer_reviews.title: Ok backpack
customer_reviews.text: This item fell short on durability but made up for it in the cheap price. Low cost equals low strength I guess. If I’m honest I filled this backpack up heavy but after about 2 months of heavy use it began to break at one strap. It’s been slowing degrading since and now I’d say 1/8 of one Side is attached. The other side soon followed. Lasted me one school year , not the Best Buy....
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kazel

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Was broken when it got to me in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lock broke almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: The lock broke within the first few days. But, otherwise a decent bag. Lightweight, comfortable, and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Back Pack
customer_reviews.text: Love the back pack, description well said, my opinion regarding traveling with this back pack was its just to much pocket space that i kept zipping and unzipping that back pack trying to find things, other then good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof but small and hot to wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my commutes to work in the rainy season. So far it's been waterproof but the width is too small to hold even a Tupperware and I find that it's not functional for me. The bottom is about an inch too narrow and my lunches constantly tip over, a bummer since there are not many decent priced waterproof backpacks available for me abroad. It works, just not for my purposes. Also, it's not "breathable" and your back gets really hot if you've been wearing it in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Broken Lock
customer_reviews.text: Lock broke on 2 different bags purchased after only a few tries
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Paul

customer_reviews.title: goo deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good backpack for the money, I haven’t tried putting a power cell in it for charging phone, but as a back pack it is really cool, the only issue I have is the handle loop on the top of the backpack has already become unattached from the backpack itself, which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Good Backpack...that's it
customer_reviews.text: As a backpack only, this a solid build. Zippers, material, everything feels nice; however, you are probably buying this one because of the "features" it comes with. Simply put, everything else is shite. The security locks broke in the first 10 mins, didn't have any paperwork with the passcode (no, it wasn't 000), the charger part was completely loose and never worked and the audio jack part was hilariously flimsy. Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Matos

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bag
customer_reviews.text: The only issue i had with this bad was that the lock on it broke after about 2 weeks. The USB port is also pretty cheap so slow i might as well just use my battery pack normally. So it pretty much just became a normal bookbag. It has a decent amount of space but i remember it not being enough to hold all the stuff i needed. it also started ripping on the insides after a bit of use, but it is very water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Darnell

customer_reviews.title: A travel must have
customer_reviews.text: I travel for work a lot and this backpack is both roomy and somehow doesn’t take up a lot of room. It carries my laptop, an office desk phone, tons of chargers and notebooks and somehow always fits under the seat of the plane. I love the charging port that lets you plug in a battery pack. Makes it easy to charge your phone as you go. I’ve also been caught in the rain more times than I’d like and it keeps my stuff dry!
customer_reviews.author: iEdwin00

customer_reviews.title: This bag is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: This Christmas, I gave this Laptop Backpack bag to one of our sons who has to use public transportation in L.A. He said it is better made than the one he had brought with him. It holds more, looks nicer and has multiple pockets and spaces for his laptop and all that he carries around with him when traveling in that city. It is a handsome bag, too, and the gray is "dressy" looking.
customer_reviews.author: Frannie

customer_reviews.title: Rather chill w/ ray rice in an elevator than buy again
customer_reviews.text: The bag is terribly small compartments even smaller and is just a hassle to use. The first one lasted two weeks before zippers broke and then the shoulder strap came off the replacement was fast but I’ve not returned the old one due to three calls for invalid return shipping label so I’m sure I’ll be charged for two bags I’d rather throw in the garbage now. Just don’t if you look at it. To much trouble from a backpack for real
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Nordman

customer_reviews.title: All in one, best budget buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this pack fro well over a year now and man has it been through some stuff. Took it through Disneyland, Knottstrips, flights to Missouri/California/Kansas/California. The only sign of wear has been the front inner pocket came apart but rarely do i use that honestly, the lock feature is a little worn out but no biggie. I still love this bag the same as when i frist got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon  Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Durable and long lasting. Great in rain.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this bag. It fits my tripods, laptop, headphones and chargers all inside and a water bottle on the outside. It’s great in rain and snow and very secure with the locks. I’ve been using for almost two years now. I think I’m going to but the bigger version as well with the additional zipper pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Broken lock
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my daughter for her trip to Germany. The item arrived in great shape but on the first day she used it the lock broke and she couldn't open her bag. The combination wheels had broken. She had to break the lock to get into her bag. Besides that the backpack is holding up ok. I wouldn't recommend if you're looking for a secure and durable backpack but it's ok as a basic backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: It's well put together and the lock at the top is easy to use. I'm not sure if it's water resistant or not since I haven't used the backpack out in the rain or anything.
customer_reviews.author: tami terry

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not really happy with this product it does not fit any of the modern devices such as port C type of devices not the easiest to carry around I don't feel secure with it easy to break into. Would not purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Mojena

customer_reviews.title: Travel backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it survives 3 different trips, loves that it has a different kind of lock, it's good to have during outings. The only thing that I didn't like is that the charging system and the aux for the earphone never worked, Something to consider
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Gil

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and well designed
customer_reviews.text: Coming up on a year that I purchased this for my son. Great quality, plenty of pockets to keep pencils, keys, phone, power bank, etc. where you can get to them, instead of the bottom of the bag. No rips a tears as of yet. That’s saying a lot after a year in the hands of a 12 year old boy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G

customer_reviews.title: Great travel backpack overall
customer_reviews.text: I traveled a few times with this one, it’s held up nicely to the typical ware of travel. The side zipper did eventually stop zipping however it hasn’t really bothered me there are plenty of places to store things still! I’ve not tested the water resistance so I can’t review that.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this backpack for travel. We’ve used it on 2 trips and the seam is coming apart. The backpack is in pristine condition and barely used but we are going to have to trash it. Based on the poor quality, I would not recommend this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Melissbr

customer_reviews.title: ive used it for over 6 month
customer_reviews.text: ive had this bag for over 6 months, no tears no rips, I love this bag. I love the locking mechanism I love the charging port and all the small pockets for pens and more. would recommend to anyone who goes to school, works in an office or just carries stuff around
customer_reviews.author: Joan gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: well it isn't waterproof so to say, more like water resistant. Its great! I've had it for a few years now and have only had a couple seams come apart (I'm not gentle with my things)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but my charging port wont work
customer_reviews.text: The charging port doesn't work on mine but the backpack itself worked for what I needed it for and got here quickly which was my main concern. Still disappointed about the charging port, it wont hold a charge which sucks because I was looking forward to using that.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good bag , looks and works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks amd durability of the bag, I bought a second one as a gift for a close friend too. I would recommend getting one if your in the market for one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ilgenfritz

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It fits my 15" laptop no problem, my 32 oz Hydroflask fits in the side pocket. It's not perfect though, the front pocket goes very deep and the bottom half isn't particularly usable, it's also kind of long, so there's a lot of unused vertical space. Not bad, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Niall

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Used it for traveling all over Europe and beyond & it held up really well. I still use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Slash

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after a couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to gift this to my high schooler but after a couple of uses the front zipper broke and we can't seem to get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.text: This back pack held up during our 2 week trip to Europe. It was light weight and just the right size. I felt secure having the locking system when we were in the crowded trains. And didn’t need to worry about items getting wet when we had rain. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn R.

customer_reviews.title: I love the design
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about this one is the design that it had. With the built in Charging Port and Headphone, it become more futuristic. Yet, the lock was very effective. However, the Charging Port did not last for long.
customer_reviews.author: Thinh

customer_reviews.title: Laptop carryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a laptop bag .not for clothes nothing else and only has Room for the laptop and a couple electronics. Good size for traveling on airplane not to
customer_reviews.author: ROSIE

customer_reviews.title: Great travel backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack for traveling! The ability to charge my phone or tablet in the backpack with a portable charger is very convenient. Also, using my headphones easily with my portable device is amazing. I would definitely recommend this backpack for anybody constantly on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Nacho

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and design for what I paid. I used it for a few times and had nothing to complain. I love the large space that can hold all my stuff for school and work, laptop, tablet, books, pens, etc. And the bag has plenty of pockets so I can keep things organized inside. There are some sweet designs, like the anti-theft lock, buckle on the side pocket, and of course, the USB charging port. Those are very helpful for daily commuters taking trams.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter, for school and within the first 2 weeks the zipper broke. It is roomy and a nice size since they don’t have lockers. If only the zipper lasted. We had to go buy a new back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Ryals

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my middle schooler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and holds laptop + school binders. The lock feature is a huge bonus. Great quality AND AFFORDABLE!
customer_reviews.author: ShyShy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of space!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! Use it everyday for work and recreation and have had no problems. Carries anything I need for the day and the anti theft mechanism works wonderfully. A few of my coworkers thought they could break it for fun and have yet to do so, I think it’s a great purchase for those that need the extra security.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The lock is the best part. Definitely wish I needed two of them! Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Gayhardt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Hold up great for a 16 yr old boy in school and that thing goes through a LOT. Great quality and durability. Wont need to buy another one for a couple years
customer_reviews.author: nikki scholtes

customer_reviews.title: Junk not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking you could lock the backpack but it’s a wast of money it has combination lock but doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Joseph mickelsen

customer_reviews.title: My Year and 2 months review
customer_reviews.text: I liked this backpack for it's sold gray look and the features. Overall, it just started to come apart the last 5mos..Zipper broke first, Insides starting to peel back and even some rips inside the storage area. It's traveled with me to San Diego, Mexico, Memphis and just a couple month ago the shoulder strap broke. I wanted to get another one, but, I'll try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for some kids that needed backpacks in foster care and they loved them!
customer_reviews.author: JScheckles

customer_reviews.title: 1 Year use
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and perfect at first, but after a year it completely broke.. not even one zipper left. kind of delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only issue not sure lock it or use special lock and instructions are not English only in Chinese.
customer_reviews.text: It everything say it is and bring college work or anywhere it holds great and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Lock was easily taken apart
customer_reviews.text: My child managed to break the lock on the first day
customer_reviews.author: Michaeljob

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Got for my daughter for school last year. It lasted through the whole year and is now on year two.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag with a lot of storage space. Holds More than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Angry Panda

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Good for a short vacation. Not a lot of room
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Good bagpack
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bagpack . It consist of locker and headphone jack.
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh Mishra

customer_reviews.title: Came as shown
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time for my flight. Looks just like described. Love the compartments and the charging port.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: terrible, lock combination system doesn't work is very cheap, materials are under average, not what expected at all.
customer_reviews.author: jeanbuloz

customer_reviews.title: Watch the weight
customer_reviews.text: Wires were an issue. Had lots of room. Great for laptop. Don't trust the lock. Material felt low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Max Alcala

customer_reviews.title: VERY SMART
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for a family member and he loved it. He used it on his trip to MX. which it came in handy bc it has the side locks.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela

customer_reviews.title: This is a WONDERFUL BUY for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size of this bag as well as the lock and charging port. This was bought for my higschooler. He had absolutely no complaints at all and loves it which is saying alot because he usually only wants nike, under armour etc...
customer_reviews.author: Tara Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in person . Still need to check it out how it holds. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: West . .

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Backpack broke within weeks of using it. The zippers broke, ultimately leaving the backpack useless for storage
customer_reviews.author: Paulo M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality, durable backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. I have purchased a couple and always satisfied with the quality. Excellent customer service/seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality materials, sub pad backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack at Christmas time 2018 for my new job, unfortunately after only a few months the seams in the front pockets frayed and had holes...had my wife sew the seams shut, but then the material above the stitch frayed. End result, mice/pens/etc fall through the bottom of the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Cragun

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter
customer_reviews.text: The lock won’t work anymore and a little smaller than I expected. Good buy for the price and I still use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Havens

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Durable but much smaller than expected it could barely hold a laptop and two textbooks
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My son likes wearing it, says it's soft on his shoulders
customer_reviews.author: Tete Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my work bag. It holds up to my normal on the go lifestyle perfectly. The added combination lock feature is a bonus because even when my bag is locked in my office I feel the extra security if another person happens to come in while I'm not there.
customer_reviews.author: N. N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: A great backpack although slightly smaller than I had anticipated. I have to try to fit my laptop, change of clothes, travel documents and a few other items into it. Probably will need to leave more items in my carry on. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Junky

customer_reviews.title: Hard to unlock backpack
customer_reviews.text: I like all the pockets. One thing is that you may have a hard time unlocking it sometimes. Ives tried to change the code twice and it won’t work and the button is slightly hard to push in to unlock the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Charger is not functioning unless you have a charging block
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize you would need a charging block at all times to use the charger
customer_reviews.author: shalane

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but broke 6hrs into use
customer_reviews.text: After 6hours into my trip and having to use the combination portion 4 times, the lock broke and we had to cut into the backpack to get my items.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Adler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a trip but use it everyday now. By far the best backpack I’ve ever owned, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn F.

customer_reviews.title: Not Water Resistant
customer_reviews.text: Bought a while ago and finally took it out into the rain. Thankfully not marketed as waterproof but wouldn't even call it water resistant. My laptop was soaked and so were all my papers inside. Do NOT buy this if you're looking for something to keep your stuff dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Rand

customer_reviews.title: Greatest book bag ever
customer_reviews.text: I love it and use it every day and I love my friends reactions when the realized there was a lock 😂
customer_reviews.author: Ed L.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a bigger backpack for a long trip, so when I received it I contacted the company about returning it. They were so gracious and kind, and the customer service was incredible, highly recommend the company, and if you don't need a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Paul

customer_reviews.title: He’s been begging for a new back pack and this one is perfect! It is perfect for a techie kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Easter. He’s been begging for a new back pack and this one is perfect! It is perfect for a techie kind of person. I love the lock feature to keep the contents safe! I know he is going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carri Jo

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack ever
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing product. The combination lock broke and they sent me a replacement one. Soo much storage space too. Perfect for long international travels
customer_reviews.author: kbal

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bag and it's well made. The hook ups work well and are secured nicely. The lock on the other hand broke on the 3rd use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great style for teen boys
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish for a teen boy. My 15 yr old loves it. Only struggle is fitting a full 2 inch binder inside. It fits...but kind of at a slant.
customer_reviews.author: Chad and Danyelle  Cushenbery

customer_reviews.title: The lock failed
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using this bag for just over a year, until the lock broke. The combination lock failed and would not open and I had to cut and destroy the bag to retrieve my valuables. If you carry this bag be sure to carry a knife to cut your way in!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kalajainen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this 2 years now. It is very durable (he’s a teen). The capacity is a little smaller than expected, but he’s still using it and likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Everyday bag
customer_reviews.text: Went to Alaska with it and now it's an everyday bag.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very good and spacy
customer_reviews.text: Very good and spacy. Perfect for short travel. I am very much impressed with this product and i recommend everyone to go for it...
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Live in Seattle and the waterproof is great and the locking zipper is a nice feature
customer_reviews.text: I drive a truck, and use it to carry all the things I may need in a few days trip. I really like having the external hookup for my phone though a pocket for my external battery would have been nice
customer_reviews.author: george Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great back pack
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pack for 2 years now and its held up great
customer_reviews.author: adam scilley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice in color and material. It’s water resistant. And is easy to clean when dirty. I loved the locks. Made it the perfect bag to travel with and take to the beach or out in public. But it’s an odd shape and outdated for ports.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal for an Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is a workhorse! I use it every day, from work to weekend trips. Definitely, I want to get another one. It's perfect for everyday use or special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Rnp

customer_reviews.title: Anti theft feature.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He loves it. He likes the look of it. He spends a lot of time at his friends house and has a piece of mind that his personal things are more secure.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Broken Zippers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my son to use at college. Both zippers broke before the end of his second semester. I wish he would have told me sooner so I could try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Very nice backpack, especially for the price! The first one was defective and they didn’t hesitate to send a new one and sent it fast. The lock is easy to use and works well.
customer_reviews.author: will Holland

product_meta.title: Travel Laptop Backpack, Anti Theft Business Laptop Backpack with USB Charging Port and Headphone Interface fits Under 17.3" Laptop, for College Student Work Men & Women
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

We are committed to providing high quality and cost-effective products, which aims to make the consumers feel the charm of the backpack itself.


Make of high density oxford cloth and come with a combination lock, protect your valuable items inside from thief, and provide more benefits for your office or school life.
USB Charging Port &Headphone interface: With a humanized USB charging interface design, it is convenient charging by connected with the portable charger and your electronic device. 
Internal structure: main laptop pocket, mobile phone pocket, document pocket, patch pocket and pen bag.


Specification: 
Material: Oxford cloth and inner Polyester
Dimensions: 19.1*11.6*7.5inch
Weight:1.6LBS
Color: Black-1
Applicable: Unisex


With a classic look that never goes out of style, durable construction, this minimalistic backpack is a must have for the daily commute to school or occasional casual travel.
feature_bullets: 【Dimensions】This backpack fits up to 17.3" laptop. Exterior dimensions (L*W*H):19.5x 12.5 x 5.3inch. Simple and practical, lightweight and comfortable，very suitable for travel，and it also work well as business/work backpack, computer bag, hiking bag, daily bag,college school backpack.

【Anti-theft Design】 This backpack apply anti-theft design techology. Includes a theft proof combination lock& durable metal zippers, no thief can open your backpack easily .Provide security for your journey.

【External USB Charger Port & Headphone Jack】 USB charging backpack with charging cable is convenient to charge smart phone/tablet/other devices. Headphone Jack: you can listen to your favorite music when you are carring the backpack on road. NOTE: NOT INCLUDE POWER BANK

【Comfortable Back Support System】Ergonomic design of S-shape padded shoulder straps and padding back design, made from high elastic and breathable sponge and fabric, equipment with adjustable chest buckle and ring type adjustable hasp, adjust the strap length freely , reduce the burden of weight, protect the back and shoulder effectively, more comfortable for your life.

【Durable Material】Backpack made of tear-resistant durable nylon fabric and its dual-access zipper with anti-theft design allows for easy access and increased safety.Lightweight, durable and anti-theft is the biggest feature of this backpack.
